entities.description: The usage of substances such as tobacco, alcohol, and drugs.
Mental health issues experienced by individuals.
Receipt of treatment for substance use and mental health issues.
The economic status of individuals, which may influence substance use and mental health.
The education level achieved by individuals, which may impact their behavioral health.
Indicates whether the individual resides in a rural area.
The quality and availability of infrastructure in the individual's area of residence.
Legal issues encountered by individuals related to substance use.

relationships.description: Relates an individual respondent to their use of substances.
Indicates the mental health issues experienced by the respondent.
Indicates the receipt of treatment for substance use and mental health by the respondent.
Relates the respondent to their economic status.
Relates the respondent to their level of education.
Indicates if the respondent resides in a rural area.
Describes the quality and availability of infrastructure in rural areas.
Indicates legal issues encountered by the respondent related to substance use.
